sentences.en: Any more colourful candidate could renege on a deal.
sentences.cn: 任何不同政见的候选人都可能就此交易而报复.

sentences.en: He reneged on a promise to leave his wife.
sentences.cn: 他背弃了诺言，离开了他的妻子。

sentences.en: If you renege again, I am going to gut you.
sentences.cn: 如果你再食言, 我会挖出你的内脏!

sentences.en: They reneged on a pledge to release the hostages.
sentences.cn: 他们违背承诺，没有释放人质。

sentences.en: You said you'd come, why did you renege on your promise?
sentences.cn: 你说你要来的, 为什么要背信弃义?

trans.tran_en: If someone reneges on a promise or an agreement, they do not do what they have promised or agreed to do

trans.tran_cn: 否认，食言，违约，放弃，拒绝
